channel.title: Outline on Bible Research
channel.description: Recent content in Outline on Bible Research

item.title: Outline of Titus 3
item.description: Here is my outline for chapter 3 of the book of Titus: Reminders about… (3:1-7) Present commands (3:1-2) Past salvation (3:3-7) Instruction for Titus (3:8-11) Conclusion (3:12-15)

item.title: Outline of Titus 2
item.description: Here is my outline for chapter 2 of the book of Titus: Behaviour fitting sound doctrine (2:1-10) Older men (2:2) Older women (2:3-5) Older women, themselves (2:3) Younger women (2:4-5) Younger men (2:6-8) Younger men broadly (2:6) Titus, himself (2:7-8) Slaves (2:9-10) Motive for/cause of right living (2:11-14) God’s grace (2:11-13) Brings salvation (2:11) Instructs us (2:12-13) To deny ungodliness (2:12) To live godly (2:12) While looking for Christ’s return (2:13) Christ’s sacrifice (2:14) Redeems (2:14) Purifies (2:14)
